title: 【高悬赏】求帮忙看看这份报错
author: 寂静人心
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-24 22:36 编辑 

我在给服务器升级版本 但是在放存档的时候遇到问题了 以下是报错
[22:10:35] [Server thread/WARN]: **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
[22:10:35] [Server thread/WARN]: The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
[22:10:35] [Server thread/WARN]: While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
[22:10:35] [Server thread/WARN]: To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
[22:10:35] [Server thread/INFO]: **** Beginning UUID conversion, this may take A LONG time ****

[22:10:45] [Server thread/WARN]: **** DETECTED OLD PLAYER DIRECTORY IN THE WORLD SAVE
[22:10:45] [Server thread/WARN]: **** THIS USUALLY HAPPENS WHEN THE AUTOMATIC CONVERSION FAILED IN SOME WAY
[22:10:45] [Server thread/WARN]: ** please restart the server and if the problem persists, remove the directory '.\world\players'

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
地图内容玩家ID转UUID失败，你可以重新启动服务器重新转换试试，如果还是不行将地图内的players文件夹删除
.\world\players 里面包含玩家背包数据，你的服务器是1.7转1.8吧？ 这版本跨度略大只能这样了。

replies.author: 寂静人心
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2016-2-25 05:41
地图内容玩家ID转UUID失败，你可以重新启动服务器重新转换试试，如果还是不行将地图内的players文件夹删除
 ...
嗯 没办法了 要损失玩家身上的物品和魔影箱的 我1.7重新开一下然后让玩家把东西放起来 这样应该就没事了
